summary: A handsome youth by the name of Tenjo Utena transfers to the distinguished Ohtori Academy. But Utena's true identity is actually a girl, who due to a certain event from her past, has ... See full summary »
cast: Tomoko Kawakami|Yuriko Fuchizaki|Leah Applebaum|Roxanne Beck|Sharon Becker|James Carter Cathcart|Crispin Freeman|Amanda Goodman|Aya Hisakawa|Chieko Honda|Kunihiko Ikuhara|Yuka Imai|Maria Kawamura|Takehito Koyasu|Takeshi Kusao|Satomi Kôrogi|Rachael Lillis|Kotono Mitsuishi|Josh Mosby|Kumiko Nishihara|Mitsuhiro Oikawa|Dan Olk|Lisa Ortiz|Tony Salerno|Yuri Shiratori|Kumiko Watanabe
title: Shôjo kakumei Utena: Adolescence mokushiroku
